text: Microbacterium pumilum is a Gram-positive and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Microbacterium which has been isolated from soil from Japan. == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Microbacterium pumilum at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2006 Category:Micrococcineae
title: Microbacterium pumilum
